name: part_004
file: tmp_【Mini 3D Live】hololive ID 3rd Generation h3ro Night Live #h3roNightLive [dQ_i_bGR3Zo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: The members of hololive Indonesia 3rd Generation (h3ro) share their impressions of the traditional game Congklak.
The trio moves to the beach sand to play Engklek (Hopscotch), and Zeta explains the rules.

subtitles.original: Congklak (Mancala)
subtitles.english: Congklak (Mancala)

subtitles.original: Ah, aku ah! Aku ah!
subtitles.english: Ah, me next! Me next!

subtitles.original: Biasa aja sih.
subtitles.english: It's just whatever.

subtitles.original: Kesan pesannya mengenai Congklak...
subtitles.english: My impressions regarding Congklak...

subtitles.original: Congklak mah seru banget.
subtitles.english: Congklak is actually very fun.

subtitles.original: Kalau kalian mau coba masakan... eh masakan lagi.
subtitles.english: If you want to try the cuisine... wait, cuisine again?

subtitles.original: Kalau kalian mau coba mainan Indonesia harus coba main Congklak!
subtitles.english: If you want to try Indonesian games, you must try Congklak!

subtitles.original: Kalau enggak punya teman gimana Kak?
subtitles.english: What if I don't have friends, Zeta-sis?

subtitles.original: Kalau enggak punya teman bisa main sendiri kamu jadi player kedua.
subtitles.english: If you don't have friends, you can play alone as the second player.

subtitles.original: Pelajaran yang bisa diambil hari ini adalah...
subtitles.english: The lesson that can be learned today is...

subtitles.original: ...punya teman.
subtitles.english: ...have friends.

subtitles.original: Aku enggak ikutan.
subtitles.english: I'm not joining.

subtitles.original: Jadi kalau kamu pesannya gimana?
subtitles.english: So, what about your message?

subtitles.original: Ya nyantai aja sih.
subtitles.english: Yeah, just chilling.

subtitles.original: Nyantai dulu enggak sih?
subtitles.english: We should chill first, right?

subtitles.original: Sangat fun ya, banyak pelajaran dan amanah yang bisa diambil juga...
subtitles.english: It's very fun, there are many lessons and values to be taken...

subtitles.original: ...dari permainan ini.
subtitles.english: ...from this game.

subtitles.original: Seperti bagaimana menjadi seorang pengatur strategi...
subtitles.english: Like how to become a strategist...

subtitles.original: ...dan membangun kerja sama tim yang sangat baik.
subtitles.english: ...and building very good teamwork.

subtitles.original: Lalu kalah.
subtitles.english: Then losing.

subtitles.original: Ini enggak bisa kayak gini!
subtitles.english: It can't be like this!

subtitles.original: Dia terlalu songong, dia lebih songong dari kamu!
subtitles.english: She's too arrogant, she's more arrogant than you!

subtitles.original: Yah mana kita se-team.
subtitles.english: Wait, we're on the same team.

subtitles.original: Kalian lupa kalau kalian se-team.
subtitles.english: You forgot that you're on the same team.

subtitles.original: Enggak usah, enggak usah, ini orang banyak ngomong.
subtitles.english: Never mind, this person talks too much.

subtitles.original: Kamu gimana pesan dan kesannya?
subtitles.english: What about your impressions?

subtitles.original: Harus nyamain tinggi nih?
subtitles.english: Do I have to match your height?

subtitles.original: Saya sangat suka dengan game-game tradisional...
subtitles.english: I really like traditional games...

subtitles.original: ...dan saya tidak sabar untuk bermain lagi.
subtitles.english: ...and I can't wait to play again.

subtitles.original: Terima kasih.
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: Jadi nih menurut kamu tadi yang bikin kalah siapa?
subtitles.english: So, in your opinion, who made us lose?

subtitles.original: Kekurangan hoki.
subtitles.english: Lack of luck.

subtitles.original: Betul kata dia.
subtitles.english: She's right.

subtitles.original: Mumpung kita semua pakai swimsuit...
subtitles.english: Since we're all wearing swimsuits...

subtitles.original: Mending kita main lagi enggak sih?
subtitles.english: Shouldn't we play again?

subtitles.original: Main lagi! Aku mau main!
subtitles.english: Play again! I want to play!

subtitles.original: Oke ayo ayo main yuk.
subtitles.english: Okay, come on, let's play.

subtitles.original: Lah ayo pergi ke selanjutnya.
subtitles.english: Wait, let's go to the next one.

subtitles.original: Engklek (Hopscotch)
subtitles.english: Engklek (Hopscotch)

subtitles.original: Ini tuh namanya mainan Engklek!
subtitles.english: This is called the game Engklek!

subtitles.original: Justru tadi kamu ngomong lompat kan?
subtitles.english: Didn't you just say jumping?

subtitles.original: Engklek itu dari bahasa Jawa yang artinya melompat dengan satu kaki.
subtitles.english: Engklek is from Javanese, which means jumping with one leg.

subtitles.original: Tapi di daerah lain sebenarnya tuh ada mainan yang mirip-mirip juga.
subtitles.english: But in other regions, there are actually similar games too.

subtitles.original: Tapi namanya beda.
subtitles.english: But the names are different.

subtitles.original: Iya iya, jadi Gen 1 tuh pernah main game ini juga deng.
subtitles.english: Yeah, so Gen 1 has played this game before too.

subtitles.original: Iya iya, di mana ya? Di EXPO kalau enggak salah.
subtitles.english: Yeah, where was it? At EXPO if I'm not mistaken.

subtitles.original: Soalnya waktu itu... oh aku ingat banget.
subtitles.english: Because at that time... oh I remember it well.

subtitles.original: Soalnya waktu itu aku narator liputan buat EXPO tersebut.
subtitles.english: Because at that time I was the narrator for that EXPO.

subtitles.original: Mending main langsung enggak sih?
subtitles.english: Better to just start playing, right?

subtitles.original: Peraturannya dulu enggak sih?
subtitles.english: How about the rules first?

subtitles.original: Jadi, tiap main Engklek itu...
subtitles.english: So, every time you play Engklek...

subtitles.original: ...kan kalian lihat ada kotaknya nih, ya kan?
subtitles.english: ...you see there are squares here, right?

subtitles.original: Nah, kalau kalian lihat di sini ini tuh namanya Bulan.
subtitles.english: Now, if you look here, this is called the Moon.

subtitles.original: Bulan? Iya yang setengah lingkaran ini tuh Bulan.
subtitles.english: Moon? Yes, this semi-circle is the Moon.

subtitles.original: Ini tuh kayak home-nya gitu lho.
subtitles.english: It's like the home base.

subtitles.original: Jadi kalian tuh tujuannya ngeloncat dengan satu kaki.
subtitles.english: So your goal is to jump with one leg.

subtitles.original: Sebelum itu kalian lempar dulu ini.
subtitles.english: Before that, you throw this first.

subtitles.original: Batu yang kayak gini tuh namanya dalam bahasa Jawa tuh Gaco.
subtitles.english: A stone like this is called Gaco in Javanese.

subtitles.original: 最初のスタート地点から2つの石をそれぞれ別の丸の中に投げ入れる。入らなかった場合は入るまで繰り返す。 / The first two stones from the starting point are each thrown into a different square. If they do not go in, repeat until they do.
subtitles.english: The first two stones from the starting point are each thrown into a different square. If they do not go in, repeat until they do.

subtitles.original: Ini Gaco, bisa buat nimpuk orang.
subtitles.english: This is Gaco, you can throw it at people.
